Class FilterOptions

java.lang.Object
uni.insubria.theknife.model.FilterOptions
public class FilterOptions extends Object
Represents the active set of filters applied by the user to the list of restaurants in the application.

Each field corresponds to a filterable attribute such as location, cuisine type, price range, minimum star rating, and availability of services.

This class also provides a method to check if a given Restaurant satisfies all the active filter criteria.

  • Field Details

    • cuisine

      private String cuisine
      The selected type of cuisine to filter by. If null or equal to "Tutte le tipologie", all cuisines are allowed.

    • location

      private String location
      The selected location or city to filter by. If null, all locations are allowed.

    • price

      private String price
      The restaurant's privce.

    • stars

      private String stars
      The star rating required. If null or zero, all ratings are allowed.

    • deliveryAvailable

      private boolean deliveryAvailable
      Whether only restaurants with delivAery service should be included.

    • onlineBookingAvailable

      private boolean onlineBookingAvailable
      Whether only restaurants with online booking should be included.

  • Method Details

    • matches

      public boolean matches(Restaurant r)
      Checks whether a given restaurant matches all the active filter conditions.
      Parameters:
      r - The restaurant to check
      Returns:
      true if the restaurant matches all filters; false otherwise

      private boolean containsIgnoreCase(String text, String keyword)
      Case-insensitive search for a keyword inside a string.
      Parameters:

      keyword - The word to search for
      Returns:
